title.rendered: Featured in Shelf Awareness + Working in Ellijay, GA!

content.rendered:
Gottwals Books Featured in Shelf Awareness

Gottwals Books and Walls of Books were featured in Shelf Awareness! Read it here.

Our franchise crew is working hard in Ellijay, GA!

excerpt.rendered: Our franchise crew is working hard in Ellijay, GA!
